Package fr.uparis.beryllium.model

Class Map

java.lang.Object
fr.uparis.beryllium.model.Map
public class Map extends Object
Our map class is a singleton pattern, designed to store all the stations and lines.

  • Method Details

    • getMapInstance

      public static Map getMapInstance()
      Method used to get the map instance. Creates a new map if it isn't created yet
      Returns:
      An instance of the used map. Creates it if it doesn't exist.

    • isMapLoaded

      public boolean isMapLoaded()
      Returns:
      true if the map exists, false otherwise

    • setMapLoaded

      public void setMapLoaded()
      Setter for isMapLoaded true if the map is being loaded, false otherwise

    • getLines

      public ArrayList<Line> getLines()
      Getter for lines
      Returns:
      lines

    • getStations

      public ArrayList<Station> getStations()
      Getter for stations
      Returns:
      stations

    • searchStation

      public Station searchStation(String name, Location location)
      Looking for a station in our map, creates it before adding it to the map if needed
      Parameters:
      name - The Name of the station we're looking for
      location - Location of the station we're looking for
      Returns:
      returns the Station if it exists, creates it before returning it if it doesn't exist

    • searchLine

      public Line searchLine(String name)
      Looking for a line in our map
      Parameters:
      name - the name of a line we're looking for
      Returns:
      Returns the Line if it exists, null otherwise

    • searchLines

      public ArrayList<Line> searchLines(String name)
      Looking for lines with a given name in our map
      Parameters:
      name - name of the lines we're looking for
      Returns:
      all lines without variant with the name given

    • addLine

      public Line addLine(String name)
      Creates a new line and adds to our map
      Parameters:
      name - the name of our line
      Returns:
      The line that was created

    • removeStation

      public void removeStation(Station station)
      Method used to remove a station from the list of all stations
      Parameters:
      station - The station to remove from the list

    • addStation

      public void addStation(Double latitude, Double longitude, String name)
      creates and adds a new station to our map
      Parameters:
      latitude - latitude of our new station
      longitude - longitude of our new station
      name - name of our new station

    • getStationsByName

      public ArrayList<Station> getStationsByName(String name)
      Method used in terminal mode to get all the stations with name as a name
      Parameters:
      name - A station's name
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of stations with the corresponding name (can be empty if no stations found)

    • walkToBestStation

      public void walkToBestStation(Station start, Boolean addFirstStation, Location lDest)
      Search for all stations between dist (start to dest) and add these stations as neighbors of the initial position
      Parameters:
      start - The starting station (coordonnees)
      addFirstStation -
      lDest - the location of the destination station
